{"data": {"post": {"main": "{\\\\\\\"type\\\\\\\":\\\\\\\"md\\\\\\\",\\\\\\\"image\\\\\\\":{\\\\\\\"ipfs_cid\\\\\\\":\\\\\\\"bafkreidmo2kdwu52qgawqetvubf6eyheuxtx3go2xjlm34dcsff5eponuy\\\\\\\"},\\\\\\\"text\\\\\\\":\\\\\\\"**Hello Protocol community** \\\\u{1f920},\\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\nIn our recent Protocol Work Group call #9 , we discussed and voted on **NEP-536 and NEP-540.**\\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\n**NEP-536,** suggesting adjustments to gas refunds, received positive feedback from all four working group members, leaning towards approval. \\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\nHowever, **NEP-540,** focusing on storage staking adjustments, was rejected unanimously due to concerns regarding potential risks and limitations. \\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\nCatch up on the recording [here](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=FPGNFDQ6rRA) and stay tuned for further announcements.\\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\"}"}, "index": {"post": "{\\\\\\\"key\\\\\\\":\\\\\\\"main\\\\\\\",\\\\\\\"value\\\\\\\":{\\\\\\\"type\\\\\\\":\\\\\\\"md\\\\\\\"}}"}}, "handle": "protocol"}

{"data": {"protocol.community.devhub.near": {"post": {"main": "{\\\\\\\"type\\\\\\\":\\\\\\\"md\\\\\\\",\\\\\\\"image\\\\\\\":{\\\\\\\"ipfs_cid\\\\\\\":\\\\\\\"bafkreidmo2kdwu52qgawqetvubf6eyheuxtx3go2xjlm34dcsff5eponuy\\\\\\\"},\\\\\\\"text\\\\\\\":\\\\\\\"**Hello Protocol community** \\\\u{1f920},\\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\nIn our recent Protocol Work Group call #9 , we discussed and voted on **NEP-536 and NEP-540.**\\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\n**NEP-536,** suggesting adjustments to gas refunds, received positive feedback from all four working group members, leaning towards approval. \\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\nHowever, **NEP-540,** focusing on storage staking adjustments, was rejected unanimously due to concerns regarding potential risks and limitations. \\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\nCatch up on the recording [here](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=FPGNFDQ6rRA) and stay tuned for further announcements.\\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\"}"}, "index": {"post": "{\\\\\\\"key\\\\\\\":\\\\\\\"main\\\\\\\",\\\\\\\"value\\\\\\\":{\\\\\\\"type\\\\\\\":\\\\\\\"md\\\\\\\"}}"}}}}

{"body": {"name": "Fellowship Contributor report by Matias Benary for 2024-04-15 2024-04-28", "summary": "Fellowship Contributor report by Matias Benary for 2024-04-15 2024-04-28", "category": "Decentralized DevRel", "timeline": {"status": "DRAFT"}, "supervisor": "gagdiez.near", "description": "I am submitting this contributor report as a [fellowship contributor](https://near.social/devgovgigs.near/widget/gigs-board.pages.Post?id=1566) led by Guillermo (@gagdiez.near).\\\\n\\\\nMy previously approved reports: [acceptance](https://near.social/devhub.near/widget/app?page=post&id=2234),[first](https://near.org/devhub.near/widget/app?page=post&id=2365),[second](https://near.org/devhub.near/widget/app?page=post&id=2550),[third](https://near.org/devhub.near/widget/app?page=post&id=2755),[forth](https://near.org/devhub.near/widget/app?page=post&id=2789),[fifth](https://near.org/devhub.near/widget/app?page=post&id=2949),[sixth](https://near.org/devhub.near/widget/app?page=post&id=3005),[seventh](https://near.org/devhub.near/widget/app?page=post&id=3104),[eighth](https://near.social/devhub.near/widget/app?page=post&id=3275),[ninth](https://near.org/devhub.near/widget/app?page=proposal&id=46)\\\\n\\\\nRequested amount: 1000 (40 * 25$)\\\\nRequested sponsor: @neardevdao.near\\\\n\\\\nSummary of Work\\\\n\\\\nMeetings/reports/etc: 6h\\\\n\\\\nUpgrade frontend, changing vanilla js to next js: 34hs\\\\nhttps://github.com/near-examples/counters/pull/7\\\\nhttps://github.com/near-examples/donation-examples/pull/9\\\\nhttps://github.com/near-examples/guest-book-examples/pull/9\\\\nhttps://github.com/near-examples/coin-flip-examples/pull/22\\\\n\\\\nTotal hours: 40\\\\nHourly rate: $25/hour\\\\n", "linked_proposals": [], "receiver_account": "maguila.near", "requested_sponsor": "neardevdao.near", "proposal_body_version": "V0", "requested_sponsorship_usd_amount": "1000", "requested_sponsorship_paid_in_currency": "USDT"}, "labels": []}

{"data": {"post": {"main": "{\\\\\\\"type\\\\\\\":\\\\\\\"md\\\\\\\",\\\\\\\"text\\\\\\\":\\\\\\\"**Hey Chain Abstraction community,** \\\\u{1f47e}\\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\nThanks for joining our first Chain Abstraction Community Call! \\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\nHighlights included a demo on minting NFTs on Ethereum from NEAR accounts, discussions on EVM support integration, and lightning presentations from ETH DAM chain signature bounty winners. These calls will be monthly, and discussions continue in our Telegram channel. \\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\n- Watch the recap [here](https://near.social/devhub.near/widget/app?page=community&handle=chain-abstraction&tab=community-calls)\\\\\\\\n- Check out more details about the call [here](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=9RSt7vPR-yM)\\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\"}"}, "index": {"post": "{\\\\\\\"key\\\\\\\":\\\\\\\"main\\\\\\\",\\\\\\\"value\\\\\\\":{\\\\\\\"type\\\\\\\":\\\\\\\"md\\\\\\\"}}"}}, "handle": "chain-abstraction"}

These calls will be monthly, and discussions continue in our Telegram channel. \\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\n- Watch the recap [here](https://near.social/devhub.near/widget/app?page=community&handle=chain-abstraction&tab=community-calls)\\\\\\\\n- Check out more details about the call [here](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=9RSt7vPR-yM)\\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\"}"}, "index": {"post": "{\\\\\\\"key\\\\\\\":\\\\\\\"main\\\\\\\",\\\\\\\"value\\\\\\\":{\\\\\\\"type\\\\\\\":\\\\\\\"md\\\\\\\"}}"}}}}

{"handle": "ai-community", "community_addon": {"id": "sai165", "enabled": true, "addon_id": "wiki", "parameters": "{\\\\\\\"title\\\\\\\":\\\\\\\"NEAR AI\\\\\\\",\\\\\\\"subtitle\\\\\\\":\\\\\\\"\\\\\\\",\\\\\\\"content\\\\\\\":\\\\\\\"NEAR Protocol is advancing its technological framework by integrating artificial intelligence into its stack. NEAR plans to develop user-owned AI applications as part of a strategic AI roadmap spanning the next 3-6 months. \\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\nAlso, we have been sponsoring hackathons with AI bounties to challenge hackers to integrate Chain Abstraction into AI projects. Check @NEARDevhub X\\\\\\'s (former Twitter) account for more information about the winners. Also, we recommend watching Illia\\\\\\'s video regarding his vision for AI and NEAR\\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\nhttps://www.youtube.com/watch?v=jt4ja2PuZ4Q\\\\\\\\nhttps://www.youtube.com/watch?v=nZQPA1IQhX0\\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\",\\\\\\\"textAlign\\\\\\\":\\\\\\\"left\\\\\\\"}", "display_name": "Introduction \\\\u{1f929} "}}
